title: How to stay extremely healthy what books should I read what should I excercise like - Quora

response.answer_text: There are several books that I have read that were really helpful to me as I have been striving over the last several years to lose weight and improve my nutrition, health, and physical fitness. I recommend the following: ACSM’s (American College of Sport Medicine’s) Complete Guide to Fitness and Heath edited by Barbara Bushman (this book will help you know how much of what types of exercise to do. It will give you the key things you need to know to create your own exercise plan) The Culprit & The Cure: Why Lifestyle is the Culprit Behind America’s Poor Health by Steven G. Aldana How Not to Die: Discover the Foods Scientifically Proven to Prevent and Reverse Disease by Michael Greger How Not to Diet: The Groundbreaking Science of Healthy, Permanent Weight Loss by Michael Greger Fat Loss Forever: How to Lose Fat and KEEP it Off by Layne Norton and Peter Baker The Blue Zones Solution: Eating and Living Like the World’s Healthiest People by Dan Buettner I also recommend these these books as being very helpful at making changes and creating good habits and breaking bad habits in your life: Atomic Habits by James Clear Changing for Good by James Prochaska, John Norcross, and Carlo DiClemente The 7 Habits of Highly Effective People by Stephen Covey
